channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- Ryzen™ 3000 Series Desktop Processors “Matisse” AM4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- Ryzen™ 3000 Series Desktop Processors “Matisse” AM4

item.title: CVE-2023-20555|2024-10-24T14:36:35.845Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%203000%20series%20desktop%20processors%20%E2%80%9Cmatisse%E2%80%9D%20am4
item.description: Insufficient input validation in CpmDisplayFeatureSmm may allow an attacker to corrupt SMM memory by overwriting an arbitrary bit in an attacker-controlled pointer potentially leading to arbitrary code execution in SMM.
